snippet: Among other challenges, analysts blame bloated menus for slower service and say the company is struggling to compete with resurgent rivals.
abstract: McDonald's reports declining sales at established restaurants across all regions, its fifth monthly drop since July 2012.
lead_paragraph: Among other challenges, analysts blame bloated menus for slower service and say the company is struggling to compete with resurgent rivals.

headline.main: McDonald’s Sales Dip Globally; China Scandal Will Hurt Profit
headline.print_headline: Mcdonald’s Sales Dip Globally; China Scandal Will Hurt Profit
